text: Camille is a 1936 American romantic drama movie directed by George Cukor and was based on the 1848 novel and 1852 play La Dame aux Cam√©lias by Alexandre Dumas. It stars Greta Garbo (in her Oscar nominated performance), Robert Taylor, Lionel Barrymore, Elizabeth Allan, Jessie Ralph, Henry Daniell, Rex O'Malley, Lenore Ulric and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Box office == MGM, says the film made $1,154,000 in the U.S. and Canada. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor
title: Camille (1936 movie)
